actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to create the Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings National Wildlife Refuge in Florida to protect the habitat of the endangered Florida panther. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to create the Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Florida.
